name: Hotstar checker
description: Hotstar account checker bot by dangernetwork

BOT_TOKEN.description: Put HTTP access token of your bot , get it from @BotFather

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Username of Support Channel / If your Channel is private then put the value from your invite link for example if your invite link is https://t.me/abAbOBu then put abAbOBu only  (caution!!! Don't use '@')

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Username of Support group / If your group is private then put the value from your invite link for example if your invite link is https://t.me/abAbOBu then put abAbOBu only  (caution!!! Don't use '@')

OWNER_NAME.description: Username of user / community channel / group , who owns the bot ( caution!!!, Don't use '@' )
